sentences.sentence: Nicotine adversely affects the functioning of the heart and arteries.
sentences.translation: 尼古丁对心脏和动脉功能有负面影响。

sentences.sentence: Price changes must not adversely affect the living standards of the people.
sentences.translation: 价格变化一定不能负面地影响人们的生活水平。

sentences.sentence: People are not adversely affected in the workplace by false self-perception of body weight.
sentences.translation: 人们在职场不会因对自身体重有错误的认知而受到负面影响。
